sense.def:
A feature of something
je zanimiv ali pomemben del ali značilnost nečesa.

seg.quote: Every car will have built-in safety features.

sense.def:
One's features
so človekove oči, nos, usta in drugi deli obraza.

Kadar film ali razstava
features someone or something
, to pomeni, da je tisti človek ali stvar njun pomemben del.

seg.quote: This film features two of my favourite actors.

sense.def:
To feature in something
pomeni biti pomemben in opazen del nečesa.

seg.quote: This is not the first time he has featured in allegations of violence.

sense.def:
A feature
je tudi poseben članek v časopisu ali reviji ali posebna oddaja na radiu ali televiziji.

seg.quote: The local newspaper ran a feature on drug abuse.

sense.def:
Celovečerni kinematografski film imenujemo tudi
a feature
ali
a feature film
.
